Thanks to Russia, its government and its support, today we do have a truly Armed Armed Force! What Morality! What Mystic! Congratulations!
Our Military are demonstrating what they are capable of! Bravo boys! Bravo girls!
And that great army of our media is not far behind! Bravo Izarra! Bravo boys!
Tremendous PopularMilitary Parade! Worthy of this GranFiestaPatriaBicentenaria! I congratulate you all and all! Now we go to the 24 of June2021!
To the charge Cavalry! Course on June 24, 2021! The Supreme Return! The Socialist Homeland! We will live and we will expire !!
Thanks to the People's Republic of China for their invaluable support to have our Armed Forces well equipped and trained!

Holding congresses of the World Azerbaijanis in Azerbaijan has become a good tradition. #Azerbaijan
The basis of this tradition was laid in 2001 by national leader Heydar Aliyev. #Azerbaijan
It was declared by the initiative of Nakhchivan in 1991 as December 31 as the World Azerbaijanis Solidarity Day. #Azerbaijan
Taking the opportunity I would like to share my thoughts on the activity of Azerbaijani diaspora organizations. #Azerbaijan
During the first congress, that is, during the last 10 years, great work has been done, the number of organizations has increased. #Azerbaijan
Five years ago, we had 336 diaspora organizations, and now their number has reached 416. #Azerbaijan
But at the same time, the quantity does not play a decisive role in this issue. #Azerbaijan
I think that our diaspora organizations should unite the whole Azerbaijani community in the countries where they operate. #Azerbaijan
Ideal variant may be that every Azerbaijani member is a member of diaspora organizations, (cont) http://tl.gd/bilbe1
I think that one of the most important factors is the unity of diaspora organizations. #Azerbaijan
There are, however, some contradictions, certain problems, and misunderstandings. #Azerbaijan
I would like to ask you to stop it if such a situation occurs. #Azerbaijan
Because we have to be together inside and outside the country. The union strengthens us. Unless we are united, we can not be strong. This is an axiom.
Cooperation between embassies and diaspora organizations should be even stronger and more purposeful. #Azerbaijan
